product_description: A rope of thick, braided jute wraps the sole of an espadrille-inspired sandal that pairs soft straps on the upper and a sporty rubber tread.
product_details_and_care:
A rope of thick, braided jute wraps the sole of an espadrille-inspired sandal that pairs soft straps on the upper and a sporty rubber tread.
1" platform (size 8.5)
Adjustable heel strap with hook-and-loop closure
Leather upper and lining/rubber sole
Imported
